vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_rd1tlifedat2(unsigned short FlibHndl,short grp_num,long tool_num,IODBTD2 *tld1);

cmn.p: Reads the various tool information of the specified tool group and tool number. The following information can be acquired.

ul.li: Tool length compensation number.(always 0 in T series)
Cutter radius compensation number.(always 0 in T series)

cmn.p: The currently used tool group and tool are referred by specifying 0 in "grp_num" and "tool_num". However, in case that any tool group number has never be specified since power-on, 0 is stored.
Please use this function to get tool data with Series 30i. The cnc_rd1tlifedata function can be only used by the tool number of under 4 digits.
Reads the various tool information of the specified tool group and tool number. The following information can be acquired.

ul.li: Tool length compensation number.(always 0 in T series)
Cutter radius compensation number.(always 0 in T series)

cmn.p: The currently used tool group and tool are referred by specifying 0 in "grp_num" and "tool_num". However, in case that any tool group number has never be specified since power-on, 0 is stored.
Please use this function to get tool data. The cnc_rd1tlifedata function can be only used by the tool number of under 4 digits.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

Pointer to the IODBTD2 structure including the various tool information. The IODBTD2 structure is as follows.
typedef struct iodbtd2 { short datano; /* Tool group number. */ short dummy; /* Not used. */ long type; /* Not used. */ long tool_num; /* Tool number. */ long h_code; /* Tool length compensation number. */ long d_code; /* Cutter radius compensation number. */ long tool_inf; /* Tool information. */ } IODBTD2 ;
The following information are stored in "tld1" with binary format.
tld1.datano Tool group number. tld1.tool_num Tool number. tld1.h_code Tool length compensation number.(always 0 in T series) tld1.d_code Cutter radius compensation number.(always 0 in T series) tld1.tool_inf Tool information.

item.name: EW_NUMBER
item.content:
data number error
The specification of tool group number(grp_num) is wrong.

item.name: EW_ATTRIB
item.content:
data attribute error
The specification of tool number(tool_num) is wrong.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
no option
Series 15i, 16/18/21/120i, 0i, 30i The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
Series 16i/18i The tool life management function, the tool life management B function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.

item.name: EW_NUMBER
item.content:
data number error
The specification of tool group number(grp_num) is wrong.

item.name: EW_ATTRIB
item.content:
data attribute error
The specification of tool number(tool_num) is wrong.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
no option
The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.

hssb.p: The extended driver/library function are necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D and 30i the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

option.need:
Series 15i, 16/18/21/21i, 0i, 30i The tool life management function.
Series 16i/18i The tool life management function or the tool life management B function.

type.li:
Series 15i
This function is influenced by 1024/512 pairs of the tool life management.

Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i
This function is influenced by 512(M Series)/128(T Series) pairs of the tool life management.

Series 30i
This function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.
the tool life management :256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management:1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series

hssb.p: The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
And this function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.

tr.td: 256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management
1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
